articles.title: ‘It starts as a line of light, then works its way across my vision’: the disorienting mystery of migraine auras - The Guardian
articles.description: It’s easy to start panicking if you start seeing zigzag patterns or flashing lights. They’re probably caused by a migraine – even if they’re not accompanied by a headache
